*The Nazi Party took power in Germany in January 1933
content.question: Which of the following was the most direct cause of the development in the years 1930 to 1933 illustrated by the table?

choices.label: The collapse of democratic states in eastern Europe
The imposition of protectionist tariffs by the industrialized powers
The collapse of financial markets after the United States stock market crash
The growing influence of Bolshevism in Europe after the Russian Revolution

content.answer: The collapse of financial markets after the United States stock market crash

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
